text: The Paraguay national under-20 football team represents Paraguay in international football. They have attended the FIFA U-20 World Cup nine times with a fourth place finish in 2001. ==Tournament records== ===FIFA U-20 World Cup=== FIFA U-20 World Cup FIFA U-20 World Cup FIFA U-20 World Cup
